### IPromptPlusConfig.ResetBasicStateAfterExist property
</br>


#### Gets or sets a value indicating whether the basic state should be reset after an exit operation. Default value is true. The Culture,cursor, foreground, and background colors are reset to their default values.

```csharp
public bool ResetBasicStateAfterExist { get; set; }
```
